name: Running Through Them Goblins
description:
Summary: In Running Through Them Goblins you play as a female thief that has been imprisoned inside a castle for doing thievery in the outside village. The inhabitants of the castle have escaped because of a goblin infestation that has somehow started inside the castle. You are now alone with the goblins looking for fresh meat. Find a way to escape!  

This was a 3-week student team project. I was in charge of all the 3d modeling, one music track,  cinematics, and marketing artwork.
